prompt: Which of the following are characteristics of a cryptographically secure hash function?
markup:
Which of the following are characteristics of a cryptographically secure hash function?

 * A. Collisions are unlikely
 * B. Similar inputs produce similar outputs
 * C. Any hash is equally likely (uniformly distributed).
 * D. The content is recoverable from its hash
